name: B
text: Best pizza i have ever had. And i have lots of experience with pizza lol

name: John Frazier
text: Cozy little restaurant. Very clean and neatly kept. Family run small town business that provides great food. Friendly staff that welcomes you when you come in. Large TV to enjoy the ball game or just sit and visit while you eat. Fast and friendly service at its best.

name: Earl Bowen
text: Nice, friendly, and busy. Food was ðŸ”¥ hot.

name: J Bailey
text: Excellent pizza, reasonable prices and friendly staff

name: Melissa Frazier
text: I love this little place. It is clean and comfortable. The food is priced very reasonably and large variety not just pizza...wings, salad, and wraps. It is so nice to have a new place in town. And we will be back. I had the bacon cheeseburger pizza and it was outstanding.

name: Mun Mun
text: Pizza pro is a great pizza place with a very broad menu full of great choices, gotta be one of the best iâ€™ve been to!!

name: Ryan Solis
text: The staff was very friendly! Food was great! I highly recommend the double deckeroni pizza and cheese sticks! The owner was not only friendly to me, but to my kids as well! It was definitely worth the 20 minute drive, and we will be back!

name: Lynanne Ivy
text: We love Pizza Pro!  Our pizza is always hot and fresh and loaded with toppings!

name: ADAM BOSWELL
text: Friendly staff,  good lunch specials.

name: Theresa Stuckey
text: I had no idea there was a pizza pro in Lonoke. When I saw it online, I decided I must try out this location. I live in a different town about 40 minutes away, so I wanted to call ahead. I called several times but no one picked up even â€¦More

name: Natalie Gassiott
text: Friendly staff. Fast service.

name: April Chilldres- Faith's Mom
text:
Always a great experience! Super quick, tasty food, & excellent prices!

My daughter is a very picky eater but LOVES Pizza Pro pizza!! â€¦More

name: Chris Webb
text: Good pizza and good atmosphere.  Friendly people. Highly recommend them

name: Chris Ramstorf
text: Great pizza. Quaint little spot in an old downtown building. We like yo stop and eat at local spots verses  chains.  We had never heard of Pizza Pro. You order at the counter eating g in or take out. We got a hand tossed pepperoni and â€¦More

name: Stefani Ray
text: Lonoke Pizza Pro now has a salad bar with lots of choices. They weigh the salad and it's $6.99 per pound. Yum.

name: Krista Newkirk
text: They are good simple

name: Kevin H
text: Delicious food at very reasonable prices. And did I mention the exceptional small-town, Southern-style customer service?

name: nancy maddox
text: The service was good and the pizza was delicious! Had great family time together!

name: Bruce Smith
text: Food was delicious and staff were really friendly! Loved my stop in there when traveling through and will go back if I ever go through that are again

name: Ross Shelton
text: I love their pizza. The service is always top notch and they usually have my pizza done before the time they say it will be done. I'm addicted to the pepperoni, Italian sausage, mushroom, and onion pizza they make. Fairly competitive prices compared to other pizza places around lonoke too. I really enjoy it

name: Ken Pasley
text: Very good pizza

name: S P
text: Today I stopped by at 12:40 for the 11:00-1:00 daily lunch special of a slice of pizza and a 1/2 salad to go. The salad bar was being taken up and the server wouldnâ€™t honor the special. I pointed out that it wasnâ€™t 1:00 yet. She said that â€¦More

name: Ashley Jacobs
text: We had a big party at noon Saturday and needed pizzas.. They don't open until 3, but they were so nice they went in early to make the pizzas for my party. Amazing customer service and food. I highly recommend the pro special and cheese â€¦More

name: t2killfor
text: Good place. I go there every Wednesday after school. Good food and nice workers

name: Michael Piper
text: Very tasty pizza and friendly service in a small town along I40 in Arkansas.  The 7 inch personal is small but well made and the 12 inch with the really high crust arpund the edges is well made but the volume of food made ir fairly big for â€¦More

name: Emily P
text: Drove from Jacksonville just to order a pizza. Been searching for a while for a good Pizza Pro. Tried the one in Conway and Morrilton and they have nothing on this location. Hot,fresh and tasted great. Will definitely be back.

name: Joyce Smith
text: It neat n clean and food is good

text: Best pizza around!! Amazing service!! The management there was great! The new Double Deckeroni was delicious! I highly recommend going there!

text: The girls are so NICE and COURTEOUS. WE GO THERE EVERY CHANGE WE GET.

name: Michael Wofford
text: Great, great pizza, fresh salads, wonderful staff.  Cute downtown cozy place, with TV's visible from all tables and booths.

name: Kris Castleberry
text: We order our pizza on our way to a meeting and ask it to be ready when we get done. We do this almost every other week. Every single time we've come (at the set time) to pick up our pizza, they haven't even put our pizzas in the oven. We â€¦More

text: I ownly ordered one pizza and it was a call in order. I waited over 30min. I had to ask about my pizza. Then the girl finally got it for me. They were rude not nice. I will not go back!
